title: not fair leaver busters...
body: I went into a game as Fiora. {{champion:114}} and all i saw was the league of legends loading screen. Then it didnt move that was all i saw then i had to wait about 4 mins then then the client came back then i saw remake. so i   pressed the play again but then it showed the leaver buster. and i just thought that i didnt leave the game it was client that did it. And i just thought it wasnt fair. can you please get rid of my leaver buster because i didnt do any thing it was the client crashing.
